summary: This is a brief internal email or memo from July 25, 2019, providing an update on Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody, specifically noting he is not on suicide watch but is under psychological observation. It appears to be a routine status report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the status update, identified by his inmate number #76318-054, who is noted as not being on suicide watch but under psychological observation while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein Custody Status Update
events.description: An internal update on Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, noting he is not on suicide watch but is under psychological observation.

keyFacts: On July 25, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was reported as not being on suicide watch.
Epstein was, however, under psychological observation at the time of this report.
This document is a routine internal status update from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, created less than two weeks before Epstein's death.
